About me



My name is Erika Deckter. I am a data scientist based in New York City with over a decade of Data Analysis experience. I am passionate about using my data analysis and visualization skills to find meaningful insights. My programming expertise includes Python, R and SQL. I have experience applying statistical and machine learning tools to real-world data sets, including classification tools such as Logistic Regression, LDA, SVM and decision trees such as Random Forests. In addition, I am conversant in Deep Learning neural networks such as CNNs and RNNs for computer vision and Natural Language Processing using TensorFlow and Keras.
